actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-163.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1452) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend for two years the authorization of appropriations for refugee assistance, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1452 (refugee assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1452) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend for two years the authorization of appropriations for refugee assistance, and for other purposes.
